data.actual_result: There's an empty space or a role without any visible members.
data.expected_result: There should not be an empty space/role.
data.short_description: There is a visible empty space at the bottom of the member list in any server if the name of any role is the only thing visible at the very bottom of the list. (You won't actually see the name of the role due to the bug)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're in a server in whose member list's bottom only the name of any role should be seen - Scroll all the way to the top of the member list - Observe the bottom of the member list
